text: @realDonaldTrump You are stupid. And, think we don't know about your using our VETERANS as guinea pigs for testing hydroxychloroquine? You and your Fox drug pushers killed our beloved VETERANS. #Biden2020 #COVID19 #coronavirus #VeteransAgainstTrump
